derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Greek thematikos, from thema (see theme)

entry.def: Thematic means concerned with the subject or theme of something, or with themes and topics in general.

example.tran: 按主题将这些材料整理分类

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or constituting a topic of discourse
2. of or relating to a melodic subject
